name: Gold Wagon
description:
Gold Wagon is a fast Arcade Game that uses an isometric view where you have to swipe from rail to rail, with non-existent brakes, exploding Crates while collecting Nuggets.

Features:

• 24 challenging levels that exercise your imagination and swiping skills

• A unique modern visual design

• Easy to learn, simple Gameplay

• Discover six unique wagons, each with their own special attributes and abilities

• Challenge your friends with Game Center. Compete for best high score!

• Original country music and handcrafted audio for an immersive experience (headphones recommended!)

• Gold Wagon is a free game
